_header: Let not us that young men be
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 886.
_description: A love song, perhaps by Henry VIII — two 6-line stanzas

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Let not vs that yongmen befrome venus ways banysht to be…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …wherfor in dede the trouth to sayIt ys for yough the metest play
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated twice for three singing voices,
